properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

A stylish and contemporary one bedroom apartment located in the heart of the city. This property features an open-plan living area, modern kitchen with integrated appliances, a spacious bedroom, and a sleek bathroom. Residents also benefit from access to a communal rooftop terrace with panoramic city views. Conveniently situated close to shops, restaurants, and public transport links.

A charming four bedroom bungalow nestled in a tranquil countryside setting. This property offers spacious accommodation including a large living room, separate dining area, fully-fitted kitchen, four well-proportioned bedrooms, and two bathrooms. Outside, there is a private garden with picturesque views and ample off-road parking. Perfect for those seeking a peaceful retreat while still being within easy reach of local amenities.

A stunning three bedroom townhouse located in a sought-after residential area. This property boasts a contemporary design with spacious living accommodation spread over three floors. Features include a modern kitchen/dining area, bright and airy reception room, three double bedrooms (including a master with en-suite), family bathroom, and a private garden. Situated within walking distance of local schools, parks, and transport links.

A charming two bedroom cottage situated in a picturesque village setting. This characterful property features exposed beams, an open fireplace, and period details throughout. Accommodation comprises a cozy living room, country-style kitchen, two bedrooms, and a family bathroom. Outside, there is a delightful cottage garden with mature plants and a seating area, perfect for enjoying the tranquil surroundings.

An exquisite three bedroom penthouse offering luxurious living in a prestigious city location. This property features spacious and elegantly designed interiors, including a grand reception room, gourmet kitchen, three bedrooms (all with en-suite bathrooms), and a private terrace with stunning city skyline views. Residents also benefit from concierge service, underground parking, and access to exclusive leisure facilities.
